scripts.query: PARAMETERS Acc361ID Long, StartDate DateTime, EndDate DateTime, MCID Long, TaxRepID Long; SELECT A.AG_CODE, A.AG_NAME, J.J_DATE, D.DOC_NO, Sum(J.J_SUM) AS [Sum-J_SUM] FROM AGENTS AS A INNER JOIN ((JRN_TAX AS JT INNER JOIN JOURNAL AS J ON JT.J_ID = J.J_ID) INNER JOIN DOCUMENTS AS D ON J.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID) ON A.AG_ID = J.J_AG1 WHERE (((JT.TX_ID)=[TaxRepID]) AND ((JT.[JT_ADDR1])='Д.А.') AND ((J.MC_ID)=[MCID]) AND ((J.[J_DATE])>=[StartDate] And (J.[J_DATE])<[EndDate]) AND ((J.[J_DONE])=2) AND ((J.[ACC_DB]) In (select id from acc_tree where Acc361ID in (id, p0, p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7)))) GROUP BY A.AG_CODE, A.AG_NAME, J.J_DATE, D.DOC_NO;

PARAMETERS Acc631ID Long, StartDate DateTime, EndDate DateTime, MCID Long, TaxRepID Long; SELECT A.AG_CODE, A.AG_NAME, J.J_DATE, D.DOC_NO, Sum(J.J_SUM) AS [Sum-J_SUM] FROM AGENTS AS A INNER JOIN ((JRN_TAX AS JT INNER JOIN JOURNAL AS J ON JT.J_ID = J.J_ID) INNER JOIN DOCUMENTS AS D ON J.DOC_ID = D.DOC_ID) ON A.AG_ID = J.J_AG2 WHERE (((JT.TX_ID)=[TaxRepID]) AND ((JT.[JT_ADDR1])='Д.А.') AND ((J.MC_ID)=[MCID]) AND ((J.[J_DATE])>=[StartDate] And (J.[J_DATE])<[EndDate]) AND ((J.[J_DONE])=2) AND ((J.[ACC_CR]) In (select id from acc_tree where Acc631ID in (id, p0, p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7)))) GROUP BY A.AG_CODE, A.AG_NAME, J.J_DATE, D.DOC_NO;
